regular-body: Not sure how I feel about this waking-up-from-second-rate-nightmares in the morning thing I’ve suddenly started exploring. Secretly, I’m hoping that I write some awesome horror story Stevenson-style, but that’s highly unlikely. Also: is horror/robots a genre? Like, “I, Robot” but scary. Presumably this was a thing at some point before Asimov’s Laws made robots “safe”, but that’s not what I mean; I mean, psychological thrillers *with* robots. Bearing in mind that I am typing this on a tiny wafer of electronics that can understand spoken direction.
